biotools.summary: NOREC4DNA is an all-in-one Suite for analyzing, testing and converting Data into DNA-Chunks to use for a DNA-Storage-System using integrated DNA-Rules as well as the MOSLA DNA-Simulation-API.

bioschemas.name: NOREC4DNA
bioschemas.summary: NOREC4DNA is an all-in-one Suite for analyzing, testing and converting Data into DNA-Chunks to use for a DNA-Storage-System using integrated DNA-Rules as well as the MOSLA DNA-Simulation-API.
